contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Enånger |image_skyline = |image_caption = |pushpin_map = Sweden |pushpin_label_position = |coordinates_region = SE |subdivision_type = [[Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Sweden]] |subdivision_type3 = [[Municipalities of Sweden|Municipality]] |subdivision_name3 = [[Hudiksvall Municipality]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Counties of Sweden|County]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Gävleborg County]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Sweden|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Hälsingland]] |area_footnotes = <ref name=scb>{{cite web |url=http://www.scb.se/Statistik/MI/MI0810/2010A01/Tatorternami0810tab1_4.xls |title=Tätorternas landareal, folkmängd och invånare per km<sup>2</sup> 2005 och 2010 |date=14 December 2011 |publisher=[[Statistics Sweden]] |language=Swedish |archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/64arqC15e |archivedate=10 January 2012 |deadurl=no |accessdate=10 January 2012}}</ref> |area_total_km2 = 1.31 |population_as_of = 31 December 2010 |population_footnotes = <ref name=scb /> |population_total = 642 <!-- This is the official figure from Statistics Sweden (Statistiska centralbyrån). --> |population_density_km2 = 490 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |coordinates_display = display=inline,title |latd=61 |latm=33 |lats= |latNS=N |longd=17 |longm=00 |longs= |longEW=E |website = }} '''Enånger''' is a [[Urban areas in Sweden|locality]] situated in [[Hudiksvall Municipality]], [[Gävleborg County]], [[Sweden]] with 642 inhabitants in 2010.<ref name=scb /> ''Enånger Court District'', or ''Enångers tingslag'', was a district of [[Hälsingland]] in [[Sweden]]. The provinces in [[Norrland]] were never divided into [[Hundreds of Sweden|hundreds]] and instead the court district (''[[tingslag]]'') served as the basic division of rural areas. ==Sports== The following sports clubs are located in Enånger: * [[Enångers IK]] == References == {{Reflist}} {{Gävleborg-geo-stub}} {{Localities in Hudiksvall Municipality}} [[Category:Populated places in Gävleborg County]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Enanger}}
